meanings.definition: The state or quality of being coplanar.
meanings.sent1: The coplanarities of the shapes made it easy to stack them neatly.
meanings.sent2: The coplanarities of the road and the sidewalk made navigation simple.
meanings.sent3: The coplanarities of the pizza slices on the plate made them look like a delicious puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The coplanarities of the clouds in the sky created a mesmerizing pattern.
meanings.sent5: The coplanarities of the book pages made it easy to flip through them quickly.

meanings.definition: The condition of lying in the same plane.
meanings.sent1: The coplanarities of the picture frames on the wall added a sense of symmetry to the room.
meanings.sent2: The coplanarities of the building's walls and roof gave it a sleek, modern look.
meanings.sent3: The coplanarities of the playing cards on the table made it seem like they were all in cahoots.
meanings.sent4: The coplanarities of the leaves on the tree created a beautiful, uniform canopy.
meanings.sent5: The coplanarities of the papers on the desk made it easy to find the one he needed.
